line_1: Or keeps the sunshine from the cottage-gate;
line_2: Where no proud mansion frowns in awful state,

line_1: Death enters with him at the cottage-gate;
line_2: A priest is call'd; 't is now, alas! too late,

line_1: He dropp'd, expiring, at his cottage-gate.
line_2: But came not there, for sudden was his fate,
